= Introduction =

What does this project do?


= Thought =

Firstly, It's a web service base on the site: http://chec.kli.st
Secondly, It's will be hosted on Google App Engine, user need to login Google account to use the feature.
Finally, We plan to build an Android client for accessing your checklist from your mobile.

*Chec.kli.st* can help you to manager your checklist online. It's not only a task reminder like [http://www.rememberthemilk.com Remember The Milk], It's primary target is to make user can share checklist. These checklist are usually people's accumulation of experience and knowledge.
